entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cypress Hills Provincial Park 10:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 69 %
Dewpoint: -3.1°C
Wind: WNW 21 km/h gust 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 1 except 6 near the Alberta border. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries near noon. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. High plus 1 except 6 near the Alberta border. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4 except zero near the Alberta border. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 4 except zero near the Alberta border. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High minus 2 with temperature falling to minus 13 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow. Wind becoming north 30 km/h near noon. High minus 2 with temperature falling to minus 13 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
